name: Gachimuchi
description:
♂You're tired of life? Dreamed of going deep into a dizzying story?
You are delighted with Gachimuchi and do you like exploring deep dungeons?

Then this game is for you.St♂ryOn a cold winter night, a lonely guy was lucky to find the k♂y. The very same k♂y that opens the magic door. Door to the Kingdom of Deep♂ Dungeons♂In Kingdom of Deep Dungeons♂ you will get:* Heavy moral choice - implications of choosing
